title: 21. You want to ingest and analyze large volumes of stream data from sensors in real- time, matching the high speeds of loT data to track normal and abnormal behavior. You want to run it through a data processing pipeline and store the results. Finally, you want to enable customers to build dashboards and drive analytics on their data in real-time. What services should you use for this task?
alternatives: A. Cloud Pub/Sub, Cloud Dataflow, Cloud Dataprep
C. Cloud Pub/Sub, Cloud Dataflow, Cloud Dataproc
D. Cloud Pub/Sub, Cloud Dataflow, BigQuery
